text: Stewardess () is a 1967 Soviet movie directed by Vladimir Krasnopolsky and Valery Uskov.СтюардессаСТЮАРДЕССА It stars Alla Demidova, Georgiy Zhzhonov, and Vladimir Etush. ==Actors== * Alla Demidova as Olga Ivanovna * Georgiy Zhzhonov as passenger-screenwriter * Vladimir Etush as Caucasian passenger * Ivan Ryzhov as passenger with children's toys * Valentina Vladimirova as scandalous passenger == References == Category:Soviet movies Category:1967 movies
title: Stewardess (movie)
